reviewText: a husband disappears just before christmas. the towns people are not too accepting of the native americans & treat the family non too kind.
Excellent, polite customer service and very speedy processing. This product received is exactly as pictured. I am pleased. Will order again from these nice people.

I kind of like David Carradine's roles, but this movie just didn't have anything of a Christmas feel to it. Likewise, it was a little on the hokey side. Christmas Miracle at Sage Creek did provide plenty of atmosphere for the flow and nature of the movie. It carried a feel of the cattleman day's northwest to it. Just don't buy it for a real good Christmas movie.
This one is a great movie, kind of predictable. Enjoyed one of the last performaces by Carradine. Still would recommend for enjoyment.
You don't have to wait till Christmas season. This is a good movie to watch all season long .
This movie was OK, but I was pretty bored.  It does not move fast at all and it was hard to keep with it.
The movie was done real well and we will enjoy watching it over and over again. It was a surprise on how well it was done. Thank you
I like the movie, it was good movie starring David Carradine, Wes Stiudi, Irene Beddard. It let you what can happens when people get together and changes one who thought all people are bad.
Good movie for the whole family. I was one of the townspeople in the movie.  I hope you enjoy watching it as much as I enjoyed being part of making it.
The DVD  is the same movie as the Miracle at Sage Creek. Just a different title and cover, no difference. Big disappointment.
This is not you typical Christmas movie. It's set in the old west with an amazing cast. Great story and very enjoyable to watch! I highly recommend!
Somewhat slow, but pretty well done as far as acting goes. Basically a variation of Christmas Carol/Scrooge.  I expected more action. David Carradine is a long way from Grasshopper.

A family-oriented western that will be enjoyed by everyone in the family!  The actors bring each scene to life.  The outdoor scenery and indoor settings are a joy to behold and study.  I highly recommend this DVD!
I first saw this film on tv.  The more I liked it.  I seem to like the Carrradine family.  David was getting good.  The father John I have like for years.  I  watch him on tcm .
I enjoyed this movie. I love Christmas movies of all kinds , really love all the Hallmark holiday DVD's. Thanksgiving also.

Typical cheesy story line of grinch-like person becoming nice, but from a truly Christmas perspective it was offensive to any Christian believing the meaning of Christmas as related to birth of Christ.  God couldn't save a dying boy but an indian witch doctor type could wave a feather and say a 'magic' prayer and heal him?  And they left a dying gunshot man out in the wilderness to die while eating a Christmas meal at home?  For non-Christians a feel good cheesy movie at best, but for Christians it was offensive making the pastor a weak and unlikable man/father/husband...
